fs.fibu2.application
Class OptionManager

java.lang.Object
  fs.fibu2.application.OptionManager

public class OptionManager
extends java.lang.Object

This class manages the global application options. It provides functions to save these options to a Preferences node and to retrieve them from it. The only option that cannot be changed via Preferences is the the application language, which is saved in the FrameworkLoader file and has to be saved explicitly. The manager also provides a dialog for the user to access these options. The option manager should be instantiated after Fsframework has been initialized.

Author:
Simon Hampe

          Constructs an option manager.

          Inserts the application preferences into a subnode 'options' in the given node
 void optionDialog()
          Displays a dialog for editing the options
 void saveLanguage()
          This saves the language the user chose to the framework configurator file so that when starting the application the next time, this language is chosen
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

OptionManager

public OptionManager(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Constructs an option manager. If a node is specified, all values which can be found in a subnode 'options' in node, are read out. The manager does not 'apply' any options, they have to be obtained from other parts of the application

Method Detail

insertPreferences

public void insertPreferences(java.util.prefs.Preferences node)
Inserts the application preferences into a subnode 'options' in the given node

saveLanguage

public void saveLanguage()
This saves the language the user chose to the framework configurator file so that when starting the application the next time, this language is chosen

optionDialog

public void optionDialog()
Displays a dialog for editing the options
